value.title: Configure the network for your virtual machines
value.excerpt: Learn how to connect your local on-premises networks into Azure using virtual networks, VPN gateways, and Azure ExpressRoute.

value.title: Create an Azure Cosmos DB database built to scale
value.excerpt: Learn how to create an Azure Cosmos DB account, database, and container built to scale as your application grows.

value.title: Enable identity protection in Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn about Azure Active Directory (AD) Identity Protection and ways to optimize the end-user experience while benefiting security.

value.title: Principles of cloud computing and deployment
value.excerpt: Principles of cloud computing and deployment

value.title: Get started with artificial intelligence on Azure
value.excerpt: Artificial Intelligence (AI) empowers amazing new solutions and experiences; and Microsoft Azure provides easy to use services to help you get started.

topItems.title: Get started with AI on Azure
topItems.excerpt: With AI, we can build solutions that seemed like science fiction a short time ago; enabling incredible advances in health care, financial management, environmental protection, and other areas to make a better world for everyone.

value.title: Get started with AI on Azure
value.excerpt: With AI, we can build solutions that seemed like science fiction a short time ago; enabling incredible advances in health care, financial management, environmental protection, and other areas to make a better world for everyone.

value.title: Fundamentals of computer networking
value.excerpt: You'll learn the fundamental principles of computer networking to prepare you for the Azure admin and developer learning paths.

value.title: How to use a GraphQL on Azure | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, you will learn about GraphQL on Azure.   For more tips and tricks, visit: https://aka.ms/azuretipsandtricks   Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit. Create your free account today with Microsoft Azure: https://azure.com/free  Azure
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/4_QfUE71p-4" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Scale multiple Azure SQL Databases with SQL elastic pools
value.excerpt: Learn how to create SQL elastic pools and how to use them to manage performance and cost for a collection of SQL databases.

value.title: Connect your on-premises network to the Microsoft global network by using ExpressRoute
value.excerpt: Connect your on-premises systems and users to Azure and Office 365 by using ExpressRoute for private, dedicated, and guaranteed throughput connectivity.

value.title: Execute an Azure Function with triggers
value.excerpt: This module demos some of the most common types of triggers for executing Azure Functions and how to configure them to execute your logic.

value.title: Implement a code workflow in your build pipeline by using Git and GitHub
value.excerpt: Learn along with the Space Game web team the benefits of collaboration through Visual Studio Code and GitHub.

value.title: Introduction to Azure Kubernetes Service
value.excerpt: Get acquainted with the Azure Kubernetes open-source container-orchestration system for automating application deployment, scaling, and management.

value.title: Manage users and groups in Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Manage users and groups in Azure Active Directory

value.title: Serverless containers with Azure Container Instances (ACI) | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: In this episode, Azure CTO Mark Russinovich joins Scott Hanselman to show how you can use Azure Container Instances (ACI) to host a containerized application. Mark deploys an image processing container in three ways: as a standalone ACI container, as part of a Logic Apps workflow, and as the backend

value.title: AZ-400: Develop a security and compliance plan
value.excerpt: Build strategies around security and compliance and prepare for Exam AZ-400: Designing and Implementing Microsoft DevOps Solutions.

topItems.title: Secure your identities by using Azure Active Directory
topItems.excerpt: Use Azure Active Directory to you secure your internal, external, and customer identities.

topItems.title: Create Azure users and groups in Azure Active Directory
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to create Azure users and groups in Azure Active Directory.

topItems.title: Authenticate apps to Azure services by using service principals and managed identities for Azure resources
topItems.excerpt: Securely authenticate apps to Azure to manage and access Azure services. Service principals and managed identities give your app an Azure AD identity.

topItems.title: Configure and manage secrets in Azure Key Vault
topItems.excerpt: Configure and manage secrets in Azure Key Vault

value.title: Choose a messaging model in Azure to loosely connect your services
value.excerpt: Learn how Azure's storage queues, event hubs, event grid, and service bus can improve your communication between devices.

value.title: Introduction to Docker containers
value.excerpt: Introduction to Docker containers

value.title: Create Azure users and groups in Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn how to create Azure users and groups in Azure Active Directory.

value.title: AZ-104: Monitor and back up Azure resources
value.excerpt: Learn how to monitor and back up Azure resources and prepare for Exam AZ-104: Microsoft Azure Administrator.

topItems.title: Design a holistic monitoring strategy on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Use monitoring services on Azure to bring operational excellence to your applications and infrastructure.

topItems.title: Monitor the health of your Azure virtual machine by using Azure Metrics Explorer and metric alerts
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to monitor the health of your Azure VMs by using Azure Metrics Explorer and metric alerts.

topItems.title: Analyze your Azure infrastructure by using Azure Monitor logs
topItems.excerpt: Use Azure Monitor logs to extract valuable information about your infrastructure from log data.

topItems.title: Improve incident response with alerting on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Respond to incidents and activities in your infrastructure through alerting capabilities in Azure Monitor.

value.title: Monitor and back up resources for Azure administrators
value.excerpt: Learn how to monitor and back up Azure resources.

topItems.title: Design a holistic monitoring strategy on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Use monitoring services on Azure to bring operational excellence to your applications and infrastructure.

topItems.title: Monitor the health of your Azure virtual machine by using Azure Metrics Explorer and metric alerts
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to monitor the health of your Azure VMs by using Azure Metrics Explorer and metric alerts.

topItems.title: Analyze your Azure infrastructure by using Azure Monitor logs
topItems.excerpt: Use Azure Monitor logs to extract valuable information about your infrastructure from log data.

topItems.title: Improve incident response with alerting on Azure
topItems.excerpt: Respond to incidents and activities in your infrastructure through alerting capabilities in Azure Monitor.

value.title: Publish a web app to Azure with Visual Studio
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Azure App Service to create a new ASP.NET-based web app, then publish and update directly from Visual Studio.

value.title: Run quality tests in your build pipeline by using Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Find out about automated testing that proves your code to be maintainable, understandable, and functioning without repetitive manual testing.

value.title: AZ-400: Facilitate communication and collaboration
value.excerpt: Explore DevOps capabilities such as continuous planning and continuous collaboration and prepare for Exam AZ-400: Designing and Implementing Microsoft DevOps Solutions.

topItems.title: Analyze DevOps Continuous Planning and Continuous Integration
topItems.excerpt: Explore the first two capabilities in the DevOps taxonomy, Continuous Planning and Continuous Integration.

topItems.title: Introduce the foundation pillars of DevOps: Culture and Lean Product
topItems.excerpt: DevOps is the union of people, process, and products to enable continuous delivery of value to our end users. Discover the first two foundation pillars of DevOps: Culture and Lean Product.

topItems.title: Characterize DevOps Continuous Collaboration and Continuous Improvement
topItems.excerpt: Explore two capabilities in the DevOps taxonomy, Continuous Collaboration and Continuous Improvement.

topItems.title: Explain DevOps Continuous Delivery and Continuous Quality
topItems.excerpt: Explore two capabilities in the DevOps taxonomy, Continuous Delivery and Continuous Quality.

value.title: Introduce DevOps Dojo: Create efficiencies that support your business
value.excerpt: Start your DevOps Dojo journey.  Create multidisciplinary DevOps teams by using shared tools and processes that are designed to make your organization’s software development and implementation projects more efficient.

topItems.title: Introduce the foundation pillars of DevOps: Culture and Lean Product
topItems.excerpt: DevOps is the union of people, process, and products to enable continuous delivery of value to our end users. Discover the first two foundation pillars of DevOps: Culture and Lean Product.

topItems.title: Define the foundation pillars of DevOps: Architecture and Technology
topItems.excerpt: There are three things required to make DevOps happen: the cultural component, tools and technology, and architecture. Discover the last two foundation pillars of DevOps, Architecture and Technology!

topItems.title: Analyze DevOps Continuous Planning and Continuous Integration
topItems.excerpt: Explore the first two capabilities in the DevOps taxonomy, Continuous Planning and Continuous Integration.

topItems.title: Explain DevOps Continuous Delivery and Continuous Quality
topItems.excerpt: Explore two capabilities in the DevOps taxonomy, Continuous Delivery and Continuous Quality.

value.title: Monitor and optimize operational resources in SQL Server
value.excerpt: Configure hardware and server resources for optimum performance after establishing a baseline. Identify sources of performance problems. Troubleshoot using Azure SQL Intelligent Insights.

topItems.title: Describe performance monitoring
topItems.excerpt: Compare Azure and on-premises tools for monitoring and measuring performance. Determine critical metrics. Understand the purpose of a baseline for comparative analysis.

topItems.title: Explore causes of performance issues
topItems.excerpt: Explore the Query Store for tracking down problematic queries. Understand how SQL Server and Azure SQL manage currency by locking and blocking, or by using snapshots. Implement fragmentation checks and defragmentation.

topItems.title: Configure SQL Server resources for optimal performance
topItems.excerpt: Choose the appropriate size and storage options for your Azure SQL databases. Configure server resources such as tempdb. Understand the usage of Resource Governor.

topItems.title: Configure databases for performance
topItems.excerpt: Control database-level configuration options. Explore Intelligent Query Processing. Configure Open Source databases for optimum performance.

value.title: Distribute your services across Azure virtual networks and integrate them by using virtual network peering
value.excerpt: Use virtual network peering to enable communication across virtual networks in a way that's secure and minimally complex.

value.title: Safeguard your environment with Azure Advanced Threat Protection
value.excerpt: Learn about the Azure Advanced Threat Protection component of Microsoft Threat Protection.

value.title: Store application data with Azure Blob storage
value.excerpt: Discover how to build an app that stores user files with Azure Blob storage, use Blob storage in a web app, and use the Azure Storage SDK for .NET Core.

value.title: Architect migration, business continuity, and disaster recovery in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn how to migrate resources to Azure, how to provide site recovery for your applications in Azure and on-premises, and how to your applications are available through service interruptions and changes in load.

topItems.title: Design your migration to Azure
topItems.excerpt: Minimize the time and resources required to migrate your on-premises environment to Azure. Assess your current systems with Azure Migrate, and migrate them with Azure Migrate and Azure Database Migration Service.

topItems.title: Protect your on-premises infrastructure from disasters with Azure Site Recovery
topItems.excerpt: Provide disaster recovery for your on-premises infrastructure by managing and orchestrating replication, failover, and failback of VMware virtual machines, Hyper-V virtual machines, and physical servers with Azure Site Recovery.

topItems.title: Protect your Azure infrastructure with Azure Site Recovery
topItems.excerpt: Provide disaster recovery for your Azure infrastructure by managing and orchestrating replication, failover, and failback of Azure virtual machines with Azure Site Recovery.

topItems.title: Protect your virtual machines by using Azure Backup
topItems.excerpt: Use Azure Backup to help protect the data for on-premises servers, virtual machines, virtualized workloads, SQL Server, Azure Files, and more.
